comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: There's another version of this photo, also taken by Jackson, in The Library of Congress Digital Collections lcweb2.loc.gov/service/pnp/det/4a20000/4a27000/4a27100/4a... This fountain was located in old Los Locutorios Street (today Allende) and Primera calle de Santa Clara (today, Francisco I. Madero), in the atrium of the church of this name. See 1802 map of Queretaro www.aquiqueretaro.com/MapaInteractivo/Mapa1802interactivo... In 1908 this fountain was demolished and subtituted by Neptune'es Fountain digitalcollections.smu.edu/cdm4/item_viewer.php?CISOROOT=... Dr. Roberto Duarte
